name.en: Dance of the Mikanko - Fascinating Bird
name.ja: <ruby>御巫<rt>みかんこ</rt></ruby><ruby>舞<rt>ぶ</rt></ruby><ruby>踊<rt>よう</rt></ruby>－<ruby>迷<rt>まよ</rt></ruby>わし<ruby>鳥<rt>どり</rt></ruby>

text.en: The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Dance of the Mikanko - Fascinating Bird" once per turn. If your "Mikanko" monster battles, at the end of the Damage Step: You can target 1 card on the field; return it to the hand. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Mikanko" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, equip it with this card, also banish that monster when it leaves the field.
